SELECT a.id, a.name, a.code, a.type, a.is_default, s.id as shop_id, m.id as seller_id, s.shop_name as shop_name, m.merchant_name as merchant_name, CASE WHEN ap.start_time > NOW() THEN '未开始' WHEN ap.start_time < NOW() and ap.end_time > NOW() THEN '进行中' WHEN ap.end_time < NOW() THEN '已结束' ELSE '未排期' END state, u.name as manager_id, ap.prize_type, a.is_delete, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.remark FROM inno72_activity a LEFT JOIN inno72_shops s ON s.id = a.shop_id LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant m ON m.id = s.seller_id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan ap ON ap.activity_id = a.id and ap.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN inno72_user u ON u.id =a.manager_id where a.is_delete = 0 and a.is_default=0 and NOW() < ap.start_time and (NOW() BETWEEN ap.start_time and ap.end_time ) and NOW() > ap.end_time and ap.id is null
and ( a.name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or m.merchant_name LIKE '%${keyword}%' OR s.shop_name LIKE '%${keyword}%')
ORDER BY a.update_time DESC
SELECT count(1) FROM inno72_activity_plan where is_delete =0 and activity_id=#{id} and NOW() <= end_time
SELECT count(1) FROM inno72_activity where is_delete = 0 and code=#{code}

SELECT a.id, a.name, a.code, a.type, a.is_default, s.id as shop_id, CONCAT(m.merchant_name,'-',s.shop_name), u.name as manager_id, a.is_delete, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.remark, date_format(apl.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS start_time, date_format(apl.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS end_time, CASE WHEN apl.start_time > NOW() THEN '未开始' WHEN apl.start_time < NOW() and apl.end_time > NOW() THEN '进行中' WHEN apl.end_time < NOW() THEN '已结束' ELSE NULL END state FROM inno72_activity a LEFT JOIN inno72_user u ON u.id =a.manager_id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_shops ap on ap.activity_id = a.id LEFT JOIN inno72_shops s ON s.id = ap.shops_id LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant m ON m.id = s.seller_id LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan apl ON ap.activity_id=a.id where a.is_delete = 0 and a.is_default=0 and a.id = #{id} ORDER BY a.update_time DESC
SELECT a.id,a.name,seller_id,shop_id FROM inno72_activity a where a.is_delete = 0 and a.is_default=0
SELECT * FROM inno72_activity a where a.is_delete = 0 and a.is_default=1 LIMIT 1
